item.title: MIUI V14.0.1.0.TLYIDXM Recovery update for Redmi Pad Indonesia
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi Pad Indonesia

Codename: yunluo

Version: V14.0.1.0.TLYIDXM | 13.0

Size: 4.0 GB

MD5: 9bd70d08a79c262aa974fef4c19fba12

Changelog:
[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 13
Updated Android Security Patch to March 2023. Increased system security.
[More features and improvements]
Search in Settings is now more advanced. With search history and categories in results, everything looks much crisper now.
